name: Ring Run Circus
description:
Discover a unique dream world of connected circus rings, perform as three magnificent acrobats and solve more than 50 tricky skill-based puzzles in the world’s first RING-FORMER.

Soar and float through levels as the speedy and elegant Nina. Slap those who get in your way with proud Ned or play as Grandpa Nelson to change the order of things.

Ring Run Circus is a ring-former: a platformer set on rings. Master each character and help them work together to solve tricky puzzles.

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1 player(s)
4000KB Minimum

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
